Lyrics Pinyin - Chinese Learning Platform

Website URL: lyrics-pinyin.com
Repository: github.com/meetqy/lyrics-pinyin
License: AGPL-3.0

Description:
A free online platform that helps users learn Chinese through music by providing synchronized pinyin lyrics. The platform offers Chinese song lyrics with pinyin transliteration to aid pronunciation and language learning.

Key Features:
- Synchronized Chinese characters with pinyin annotations
- Full pinyin coverage for all Chinese characters
- Print-friendly format for offline learning
- PDF downloads of lyrics
- No registration required for access
- Search functionality for songs and artists
- Difficulty ratings for songs
- Mobile-responsive design

Tech Stack:
Frontend:
- Next.js 14
- TypeScript
- Tailwind CSS
- shadcn/ui components
- Apollo Client for GraphQL

Backend:
- Strapi (Headless CMS)
- PostgreSQL database
- GraphQL API

Infrastructure:
- Frontend hosted on Vercel
- Backend hosted on Digital Ocean
- PostgreSQL database for content storage

Project Structure:
/nextjs - Frontend application
/strapi - Backend CMS
